name: omega-one
description: Omega One - Unified Frontend and Backend Monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:apps && npm run install:packages
scripts.install:apps: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:packages: npm run install:shared-types && npm run install:shared-utils && npm run install:shared-config
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:shared-types && npm run build:shared-utils && npm run build:shared-config
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:packages && npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.type-check:packages: npm run type-check:shared-types && npm run type-check:shared-utils && npm run type-check:shared-config
scripts.clean: rm -rf apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules tools/*/node_modules node_modules apps/*/dist packages/*/dist
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && npm run install:all

author: Prewave Team
